about.title: Our Story
about.body: Luxe Beauty Studio opened in 2018 with a passion for empowering people through transformative beauty services. Our team of award-winning stylists brings together cutting-edge techniques, premium products, and personalized care to create stunning results. We believe beauty is personal, and every client deserves a customized experience that enhances their unique features and style.
about.subtitle: Why choose Luxe

items.text: I've been going to Luxe for 2 years and wouldn't trust my hair to anyone else! Sarah is a color genius - my balayage always looks incredible. The salon is beautiful and everyone is so welcoming.
items.author: Emily Martinez

items.text: Had my bridal hair trial and wedding day styling here - absolutely perfect! They made me feel like a princess. The team is professional, talented, and so much fun. Highly recommend!
items.author: Jessica Park

items.text: Best haircut I've ever had! The consultation was thorough and Alex really listened to what I wanted. The salon is gorgeous and the service is top-notch. Worth every penny!
items.author: Michael Chen

team.title: Meet Our Stylists
team.subtitle: Expert professionals dedicated to your beauty

members.name: Sarah Williams
members.title: Master Colorist & Owner
members.bio: With 15 years of experience and advanced color certifications, Sarah specializes in balayage, color correction, and custom color formulations. Her work has been featured in beauty magazines and she's passionate about ongoing education.

members.name: Alex Rodriguez
members.title: Lead Stylist
members.bio: Alex is a precision cutting expert known for creating beautiful, wearable styles that fit each client's lifestyle. Specializing in curly hair, men's cuts, and modern styling techniques.

members.name: Maya Patel
members.title: Extension & Bridal Specialist
members.bio: Maya is our go-to expert for extensions and bridal styling. With certifications in multiple extension methods and years of bridal experience, she creates stunning, long-lasting results.

members.name: Jordan Lee
members.title: Senior Stylist
members.bio: Jordan brings creative energy and technical skill to every appointment. Specializing in modern color techniques, blondes, and lived-in color that grows out beautifully.

items.question: Do I need an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, we operate by appointment only to ensure each client receives dedicated attention. Walk-ins are welcome if stylists are available, but we recommend booking in advance.

items.question: What products do you use?
items.answer: We use premium professional lines including Redken, Olaplex, Kevin Murphy, and R+Co. All our color products are gentle and long-lasting.

items.question: How often should I get my color touched up?
items.answer: It depends on the service! Root touch-ups are typically every 4-6 weeks, while balayage and lived-in color can last 3-4 months. We'll recommend a maintenance schedule during your appointment.

items.question: Do you offer consultations?
items.answer: Yes! Free consultations are included with every appointment. For major transformations or color corrections, we recommend scheduling a separate consultation appointment.

items.question: What's your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We require 24-hour notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations or no-shows may incur a fee equal to 50% of the service cost.

items.question: Can you match my hair to a photo?
items.answer: We love inspiration photos! Bring them to your consultation. We'll discuss what's achievable with your hair type and current condition.

items.question: Do you do men's haircuts?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our stylists are experienced with all types of cuts, including classic men's styles and modern trends.

items.question: How long does a balayage take?
items.answer: Balayage typically takes 3-4 hours depending on your hair length and desired result. We'll give you an accurate time estimate during your consultation.
